title: This Time
description: “Oh, God! So much blood!”With Grace’s blood glittering on his fingers, Lucian finds himself the unwitting architect of events that play straight into the Devil’s hands.As Grace sinks deeper into Evil’s seductive embrace, it seems that nothing can tear her away.Banding together, her friends launch a plan, but the Devil is no fool.Losing more than just the battle, what could possibly be done to make anything right again? What can be done when so much has been ripped away?As Grace struggles to fight her way out of Lu’s grasp, she discovers that they are all bound much tighter than she feared.Begin your journey:THIS BLOOD The Grace Allen Series Book OneTHIS CURSE The Grace Allen Series Book TwoComing soon: THIS NIGHT The Fourth and Final installment of The Grace Allen Series!
author: Alisha Basso
